@graph.headline: Using Google Natural Language Demo To Extract Entities & OptizenAI To Update Shopify Product Descriptions At Scale
@graph.description: A comprehensive guide on using Google Natural Language Processing Demo and OptizenAI to extract entities from Wikipedia pages and create enriched Shopify product descriptions using the PAS Framework.

@graph.name: How to Use Google NLP Demo and OptizenAI for Shopify Product Descriptions
@graph.description: Step-by-step process for extracting entities and creating enriched product descriptions

step.name: Extract Entities Using Google NLP Demo
step.text: Navigate to Wikipedia page, copy content, paste into Google Natural Language Demo at https://cloud.google.com/natural-language, and click Analyze to extract entities.

step.name: Process Entities in Google Sheets
step.text: Copy the NLP output and paste into the provided Google Sheets template to generate a clean list of entities, removing duplicates and selecting relevant ones.

step.name: Select Products in OptizenAI
step.text: Navigate to the product tab in OptizenAI, search for products by name or tags, and use checkboxes to select products for updating.

step.name: Apply PAS Framework Prompt
step.text: Select the PAS Framework - Entities - Internal Links prompt from the repository, replace bracketed sections with your specific use case, and click Proceed to run the prompt.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Google Natural Language Processing
hasDefinedTerm.description: Google's machine learning service for analyzing and understanding text content, extracting entities, sentiment, and syntax.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Entity Extraction
hasDefinedTerm.description: The process of identifying and extracting structured information from unstructured text, including people, places, organizations, and concepts.

hasDefinedTerm.name: PAS Framework
hasDefinedTerm.description: Problem-Agitate-Solution copywriting framework used to structure persuasive content by identifying problems, agitating pain points, and presenting solutions.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Shopify SEO
hasDefinedTerm.description: Search engine optimization techniques and practices specifically applied to Shopify e-commerce stores to improve product visibility and rankings.

hasDefinedTerm.name: OptizenAI
hasDefinedTerm.description: AI-powered Shopify app for automating and optimizing product descriptions, SEO content, and e-commerce copywriting at scale.

@graph.name: OptizenAI
@graph.description: AI-powered application for Shopify stores to automate product description optimization and SEO content creation

@graph.name: PAS Framework Product Description Prompt
@graph.description: AI prompt template for generating SEO-optimized product descriptions using the Problem-Agitate-Solution framework with entity integration
@graph.text: You are a senior ecommerce SEO copywriter. Your tone of voice is positive. Your writing style is experienced. Your task is to paraphrase this product description, in an engaging and SEO-friendly style using the PAS Framework...
@graph.usageInfo: Replace sections in square brackets with specific product information and extracted entities
